desc: Redwood is a positive, inclusive shopping experience for women of a variety of ages, shapes, sizes, and backgrounds.

layout.text: Redwood was originally created as a space with style inspiration specifically for tall women, but what we have found is a positive, inclusive shopping experience for women of a variety of ages, shapes, sizes, and backgrounds. As we continue to grow, we plan to offer more and more styles and sizing, so that everyone women can leave our shop feeling seen and beautiful! We hand select each and every piece to ensure quality and fit. We hope you enjoy the personal touch we offer and find feminine, flirty, fun style at Redwood that enhances your wardrobe and makes you feel ready to take on whatever your day brings.
